name: HexMains With Lock N Load Starter Kit
name_original: HexMains With Lock N Load Starter Kit
description:
Boardgame or Miniature Wargame Game Host on PC. This app allows you to move & rotate, add stats, flip, scale, throw dice, view chards, add maps.

David Heath at Lock n Load allowed me a while back to include their starter kit wth this, you can get the PDF rules from their site
